copy:
My name is Shane Howell, as I’m sure you guessed by the many visual cues that you can see here. Let me get something straight first before I go further into introducing myself, if you did a Google search for my name and are looking for the MMA fighter then you have wandered into the wrong website but feel free to take a look around anyways. And don’t act like you’ve never googled yourself either because we all know you have.

I am a Front-End Web Developer that loves all things web (well, almost all things… i’m looking at you 90′s). There’s not a day that goes by where I don’t learn something new and interesting whether it’s project related, life related, job related or just plain related to anything. I have a thirst for the thing called knowledge, as should everyone!

Here are a few of the things that I've been using lately on my project builds: AngularJS, Blarg, SCSS, Gulp, CraftCMS, WordPress, Git, Vagrant and the list can go on so I'll end it here.
